From:  (USANYS)" <1 
To: a"tANYS) [Contractor]"  
>, ' 
(USANYS)" 
Subject: RE: Request for Jeffrey Epstein Suicide Reconstruction Report 
Date: Wed, 16 Sep 2020 13:16:54 +0000 
Great. Makes sense. 
From: (USANYS) [Contractor] < 
Sent: Tuesday, September 15, 2020 4:18 PM 
To: (USANYS)> 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Request for Jeffrey Epstein Suicide Reconstruction Report 
do. And yes, I've asked Annie to help out on this case. 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Tuesday, September 15, 2020 4:14 PM 
To: (USANYS) [Contractor] 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: FW: Request for Jeffrey Epstein Suicide Reconstruction Report 
Hi MI— can you add this to the next MCC discovery production? Also, is there another paralegal that'll be working on this 
case with you? 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, September 15, 2020 4:10 PM 
To: (USANYS)<> 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Request for Jeffrey Epstein Suicide Reconstruction Report 
- thank you for touching base on this request. Please see the attached, to be produced under the rotective order. If it 
is to be used publicly, please keep us apprised so we can let our media and leg affairs staff know. cc'd here, 
and his staff can also assist in anything further you need for this case. Thank you for your assistance, and again, apologies 
for the delay. 
>>>WM 9/11/2020 12:02 PM 
>>> 
Hello 
Please give me a call on this request. My number is 202-598-5491. Thank you-
Assistant Director/General Counsel 
Federal Bureau of Prisons 
Office of General Counsel 
320 First Street, NW 
Washin ton DC 20534 
EFTA00025536

E-Mail: khyleebop.gov
SENSITIVE/PRIVILEGED COMMUNICATION 
The information contained in this electronic message and any and all accompanying documents constitutes sensitive 
information. This information is the property of the U.S. Department of Justice. 
If you are not the intended recipient of this information, any disclosure, copying, distribution, or the taking of any action in 
reliance on this information is strictly prohibited. If you received this message in error, please notify us immediately at the 
above number to make arrangements for its return to us. 
(USANYS)" < >  9/10/2020 5:17 PM >>> 
Omar Daza gave us your contact information. We're looking for a copy of the final suicide reconstruction report relating to 
Jeffrey Epstein. We've seen some drafts in documents sent by the BOP to our office, but we'd appreciate having the final. 
Can you send it? If you have any questions, we'd be happy to discuss. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00025537
